definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the glyceryl polyether by nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 用核磁共振分析了甘油聚醚。

sentences.english: Functional magnetic resonance imaging of activity in the subjects' brains hints at a possible explanation.
sentences.chinese: 受试者的大脑活动的核磁共振成像暗示着一个解释。

sentences.english: The structures of both are characterized by FT-TR and 1H-NMR.
sentences.chinese: 借助红外光谱和1H核磁共振谱图分析了产物的结构。

sentences.english: The 13C-NMR and 1H-NMR spectra were reported for the macrocyclic polyaryl-ester oligomer.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了环状聚芳酯低聚物的核磁共振碳谱及氢谱。

sentences.english: Results The structure of the target molecule was identified by 1H NMR, 13C NMR and element analysis.
sentences.chinese: 结果最终产物由核磁共振谱和元素分析进行结构鉴定。

sentences.english: And yet, according to the MRI, my libido is surprisingly strong.
sentences.chinese: 然而，根据核磁共振成像，我的性驱力出人意料的强。

sentences.english: NMR and FTIR were used to characterize the structure of terminal groups of the copolyethers.
sentences.chinese: 利用核磁共振法表征了双丁基聚醚的端基结构。

sentences.english: The topological structure of the dendrimer spacer arms was inspected by solid-state 13C NMR.
sentences.chinese: 用13C固体核磁共振检测了树状间隔臂的拓扑结构。

sentences.english: CT scans and MRI showed enlargement of right medial rectus muscle.
sentences.chinese: 电脑断层与核磁共振皆显示右侧内直肌增大。

sentences.english: They were given M. R. I. , magnetic resonance imaging test to inspect for damaged brain tissue and signs of stroke.
sentences.chinese: 通过核磁共振成像检查脑部受损情况以及中风的征兆。

sentences.english: Aim To identify the structure of the new drug lomerizine dihydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的用核磁共振方法鉴定新药盐酸洛美利嗪的结构。

sentences.english: Structure characterization and film morphology of polyether/UV-absorbing groups containing polysiloxane;
sentences.chinese: 利用核磁共振法表征了双丁基聚醚的端基结构。

sentences.english: On MRI scans, white spots showed up in the prefrontal cortex.
sentences.chinese: 核磁共振扫描显示，白色斑点出现在前额叶皮层。

sentences.english: MRI has caused a stir in the medical community.
sentences.chinese: 核磁共振造影术在医界引起一阵骚动。

sentences.english: This paper reports the structral elucidation of two compounds using pulsed NMR difference NOE technique.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了核磁共振差谱NOE技术及二个应用实例。

sentences.english: NMR was used to characterize the Structure of terminal groups of the copolyethers.
sentences.chinese: 利用核磁共振法表征了双丁基聚醚的端基结构。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
